nl.jworks.grails.plugin.fitnesse.methodexecutor
[Groovy] Class FunctionAsPropertyMethodExecutor

java.lang.Object
  fitnesse.slim.MethodExecutor
      nl.jworks.grails.plugin.fitnesse.methodexecutor.GroovyMethodExecutor
          nl.jworks.grails.plugin.fitnesse.methodexecutor.FunctionAsPropertyMethodExecutor

class FunctionAsPropertyMethodExecutor
extends GroovyMethodExecutor

Converts a method, by Robert C. Martin referred to as a 'function' to a normal getter function. This allows you to write Decision Table fixtures without the need for a special method without the 'get' prefix. Without this method executor, your fixture would look like this: 

 class MyFixture {
    String name

    String name() {
      return name
    }
 }
Because of this class, you can rewrite the fixture to: 
 class MyFixture {
    String name
 }
Authors:
Erik Pragt
